title: Word Explorers (English-based session)
description: To enhance children's confidence in communication, language use, and creative expression by blending elements of storytelling, writing, debating, and vocabulary games.

title: Logic Quest (Math Scavenger Hunt)
description: To develop logical reasoning, problem-solving, and applied math skills through a team-based scavenger hunt format.

title: Tech Challenge (Robotics)
description: To introduce foundational engineering and logic concepts through physical, hands-on robotics challenges.

title: SEL Energizer
description: To help children reflect, recharge, and build emotional awareness through intentional group-based activities.

title: Frame by Frame (Animation and Story Art)
description: To enable children to translate stories into visual sequences, introducing the basics of animation through drawing, sequencing, and character design.

title: Team Relay Challenge and Final Task
description: To integrate elements from all four stations into a dynamic, fun competition that reinforces learning through action.

title: Closing Ceremony and Awards
description:
• Each child receives a participation certificate and feedback on their performance.
  • Awards are given for creativity, effort, communication, and team spirit.
  • A brief stakeholder reflection and team photo wrap up the event.
